attributes.action: A 2nd EU Referendum due to many Leave voters believed the £350 million NHS spend
attributes.additional_details:
The interview from This Morning TV Programme. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cA3XTYfzd1I
attributes.background:
I based my vote on the Leave campaigns promise to spend the £350million on the NHS: a slogan printed on their bus and a major feature of this campaign. 
I was horrified that on the morning after the vote was closed that Nigel Farage was saying on national TV that this was a 'mistake'.
